section.title: Description
section.p: PMD's Copy/Paste Detector (CPD) is used to check for redundant code fragments. It requires the Java Runtime Environment and is able to parse at least Java, C and C++ codes.

section.title: Download
section.p: PMD is available for download at . The current version (Mar 2012) is 5.0 Alpha. Just download the file pmd-bin-5.0-alpha.zip.

section.title: Installation
section.p: Extract the archive pmd-bin-5.0-alpha.zip in the recommended installation folder %ProgramFiles%\PMD\.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: The configuration is contained in the test script Tests\PMD\build.bat. Beside that there is no specific configuration of PMD necessary.

section.title: Usage
section.p: The test script Tests\PMD\build.bat automatically rund on the Sources folder and generates HTML report files.
